[color=#f1c232][size=5][u][b][INSTALL/UNINSTALL][/b][/u][/size][/color]

[size=4][u]Install[/u][/size]

- Simply copy the files of your choice from the downloaded zip folder and paste them to your Skyrim application Data folder located in the Steam root
directory.

[size=4][u]Uninstall[/u][/size]

- Delete all installed files which should be easy due to how I have organized them.
